metadata.description: Neuro-symbolic UI framework combining behavioral programming with generative AI. Build reactive custom elements, train world agents from validated designs, and deploy via protocol adapters (ACP/A2A/MCP).

plugins.name: workshop
plugins.description: Full-stack AI workshop for Plaited development. Includes: loom (unified design-to-agent pipeline with training, workbench, and deployment), behavioral-core (bProgram patterns), ui-patterns (templates & styling), and typescript-lsp (type verification). Requires Bun runtime.
